text: 2025/7/22 04:09 Chemistry Postgraduate Handbook - Home

The Department hosts around 100 research students pursuing PhD and MSc by Research projects and provides a lively and
supporting environment to pursue independent research, using excellent facilities under the supervision of internationally
renowned staff.

This SharePoint site has been designed to give you helpful information to guide you through your postgraduate studies at
Durham.
All of the information can be accessed along the top panel drop downs at any point when you are in SharePoint.

This is the Postgraduate Research (PgR) area where you will find useful information on key policies and procedures for PgR
students.
If there is anything you can't find here, or if you have any questions please contact chemistry.pg@durham.ac.uk
If you are looking for the Welcome page click here.
